<a id="XRBodyModifier3D"></a>

# XRBodyModifier3D

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [SkeletonModifier3D](SkeletonModifier3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A node for driving body meshes from [XRBodyTracker](XRBodyTracker.md) data.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This node uses body tracking data from an [XRBodyTracker](XRBodyTracker.md) to pose the skeleton of a body mesh.

Positioning of the body is performed by creating an [XRNode3D](XRNode3D.md) ancestor of the body mesh driven by the same [XRBodyTracker](XRBodyTracker.md).

The body tracking position-data is scaled by [Skeleton3D.motion_scale](Skeleton3D.md#Skeleton3D_property_motion_scale) when applied to the skeleton, which can be used to adjust the tracked body to match the scale of the body model.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [XR documentation index](../tutorials/xr/index.md)

[BoneUpdate](XRBodyModifier3D.md#enum_XRBodyModifier3D_BoneUpdate) **BONE_UPDATE_FULL** = `0`

The skeleton's bones are fully updated (both position and rotation) to match the tracked bones.<a id="XRBodyModifier3D_constant_BONE_UPDATE_ROTATION_ONLY"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BoneUpdate](XRBodyModifier3D.md#enum_XRBodyModifier3D_BoneUpdate) **BONE_UPDATE_ROTATION_ONLY** = `1`

The skeleton's bones are only rotated to align with the tracked bones, preserving bone length.<a id="XRBodyModifier3D_constant_BONE_UPDATE_MAX"></a>
